ADVANCED_TARGET_SCANNER_DESCRIPTION.message: Sganair le amas fada a ruigeas an siostam gu lèir.

ATMOSPHERIC_SHIELDING_DESCRIPTION.message: Dìonaidh e an soitheach-fànais agad on teas nuair a thilleas e dhan àile.

ATMOSPHERIC_SHIELDING_HEAVY.description: Will withstand higher pressures than normal Atmospheric Shielding

CARGO_LIFE_SUPPORT_DESCRIPTION.message: Leigidh seo leat carago beò a ghiùlan.

CARGO_SCOOP_DESCRIPTION.message: Leigidh e leat bogsaichean carago a thogail on fhànas.

DAMAGE_PER_SHOT.description: Tooltip explaining weapon damage per shot

ECM_ADVANCED_DESCRIPTION.message: Siostam dìon astasan-bacaidh leatronach aig a bheil comas seòrsaichean nas adhartaiche de dh’astasan-iùil a sgrios.

ECM_BASIC_DESCRIPTION.message: Siostam dìona dealanach an aghaidh astasan a nì milleadh air cuid a dh’astasan le fèin-stiùireadh.

EMPTY_SLOT.description: Text indicating an empty equipment slot.

FUEL_SCOOP_DESCRIPTION.message: Leigidh seo leat connadh hàidhdreaidein a sgobadh o mhòr-phlanaidean gasa.

HULL_AUTOREPAIR_DESCRIPTION.message: Càraichidh seo an t-slige gu fèin-obrachail nuair a bhios i air dochann.

HYPERCLOUD_ANALYZER_DESCRIPTION.message: Sgrùd neòil os-fhànais gus an ceann-uidhe agus an ùine gus falbh no ruigsinn a shuidheachadh.

LASER_COOLING_BOOSTER_DESCRIPTION.message: Siostam fuaraidh leasaichte airson nan arm agad.

MININGCANNON_17MW_DESCRIPTION.message: Losgaidh tu air dreagan beartach leis a chùm mèinnearachd.

MININGCANNON_5MW_DESCRIPTION.message: Losgaidh tu air dreagan beartach leis a chum mèinnearachd.

MULTI_SCOOP.description: A ship equipment: a cargo scoop and fuel scoop combined into one

MULTI_SCOOP_DESCRIPTION.message: Ged nach eil e cho èifeachdach ’s a tha sgiob connaidh, ’s urrainn dhut an dà chuid carago is connadh a sgobadh leis

ORBIT_SCANNER.description: A ship equipment that records data of terrain, for cartography mapping/geological survey. Note: Scout Mission module reference and distinguishes between 'orbital' and 'surface' scanner types, the former scans planet from orbit, the latter from low altitude.

ORBIT_SCANNER_DESCRIPTION.message: Scans planet from orbit, for scientific data

ORBIT_SCANNER_GOOD.description: A sensor used to scan planets from high altitude / orbit + model number (that's minimum km altitude)

ORBIT_SCANNER_GOOD_DESCRIPTION.message: Scans planet from orbit, for scientific data, with high resolution and wide aperture lens

OUT_OF_SCANRANGE.message: Tha e nas fhaide air falbh na ghabhas sganadh:

RADAR_DESCRIPTION.message: Bheir seo mapa 3D dhut dhe na soithichean am fagas.

SHIELD_ENERGY_BOOSTER_DESCRIPTION.message: Tillidh teàirrds dha na sgiathan nas luaithe.

SHIELD_GENERATOR_DESCRIPTION.message: Bheir seo barrachd dìona dhan t-slige leis gach aonad a chuireas tu ris.

SHOTS_PER_MINUTE.description: Tooltip explaining weapon fire rate / RPM counter

STARTING_SCAN.message: A’ tòiseachadh air an sganadh, astar amais:

SURFACE_SCANNER.description: A ship equipment that records data of terrain, for cartography mapping/geological survey. Note: Scout Mission module reference and distinguishes between 'orbital' and 'surface' scanner types, the former scans planet from orbit, the latter from low altitude. Model manufacturer name is meant to sound like a cheap brand.

SURFACE_SCANNER_DESCRIPTION.message: Cartography mapping and geological survey recorder

SURFACE_SCANNER_GOOD.description: A ship equipment that records data of terrain, for cartography mapping/geological survey. Note: Scout Mission module reference and distinguishes between 'orbital' and 'surface' scanner types. Model manufacturer name is meant to be associated with high quality.

SURFACE_SCANNER_GOOD_DESCRIPTION.message: High resolution cartography mapping and geological survey recorder

TARGET_SCANNER_DESCRIPTION.message: Cleachdaidh tu e gus uidheamachd, carago is cor shoithichean eile a sgrùdadh aig astar.

THRUSTERS_BASIC_DESCRIPTION.message: Seòrsa dhe phutairean a chaidh atharrachadh agus ùghdarrachadh airson an t-soithich agad.

THRUSTERS_BEST_DESCRIPTION.message: Putairean gnàthaichte a bheir a’ chumhachd as fheàrr dhut.

THRUSTERS_MEDIUM_DESCRIPTION.message: Putairean a chaidh a phiseachadh ach am bi iad nas èifeachdaiche agus a’ putadh le barrachd cumhachd.

TOTAL_MODULE_CAPACITY.description: Tooltip explaining module capacity of specific slot

TOTAL_MODULE_WEIGHT.description: Tooltip explaining total equipped weight of specific slot

TRADE_COMPUTER.description: Ship equipment computing profitable commodities to trade between two systems

TRADE_COMPUTER_DESCRIPTION.message: Seallaidh e bathar-amh dhut a bhios prothaideach airson malart eadar an siostam a thagh thu is am fear làithreach
